objects.specification: A square platform floor surface serving as the foundation of the booth, crafted with a smooth, durable material in a neutral light gray tone. The floor spans a generous area to host various objects and is slightly elevated with a thin profile to clearly define the booth boundaries while ensuring stability and a polished finish.
A vertical wall panel with moderate height, smooth surface and a solid white finish, forming the enclosure of the booth while maintaining a clean, modern appearance.
A vertical wall panel with moderate height, smooth surface and a solid white finish, forming the enclosure of the booth while maintaining a clean, modern appearance.
A vertical wall panel with moderate height, smooth surface and a solid white finish, forming the enclosure of the booth while maintaining a clean, modern appearance.
A vertical wall panel with moderate height, smooth surface and a solid white finish, forming the enclosure of the booth while maintaining a clean, modern appearance.

A large rectangular registration desk designed for visitor check-in, featuring a bold bright red (RGB approx 220,20,60) high-gloss finish. The desk has clean, straight lines, sturdy construction, and a spacious countertop to accommodate signage and materials, with a sleek modern aesthetic that draws attention as the focal point at the booth entrance.

A tall, slender promotional banner with a vibrant yellow (RGB approx 255,223,0) color, featuring a lightweight yet sturdy support structure. The banner is designed as an elongated rectangle, printed on a smooth, slightly reflective material for high visibility and brand messaging, standing prominently beside the registration desk.

A tall, slender promotional banner with a vibrant yellow (RGB approx 255,223,0) color, featuring a lightweight yet sturdy support structure. The banner is designed as an elongated rectangle, printed on a smooth, slightly reflective material for high visibility and brand messaging, standing prominently beside the registration desk.

A round display table with polished wood finish (RGB approx 160,82,45), featuring a smooth circular tabletop supported by a sturdy central pedestal. The table has a refined, contemporary appearance with warm wood grain details and a subtle reflective sheen.

A round display table with polished wood finish (RGB approx 160,82,45), featuring a smooth circular tabletop supported by a sturdy central pedestal. The table has a refined, contemporary appearance with warm wood grain details and a subtle reflective sheen.

A modern chair with dark blue (RGB approx 0,0,139) upholstered seat and backrest, complemented by a slender metal frame. The chair is ergonomically contoured, with a subtle matte texture and clean lines to provide comfortable seating around display tables.

children.specification: A small decorative potted plant with a textured ceramic pot and lush green foliage, adding a natural accent beside the podium. The planter has a subtle matte glaze and the plant features cascading leaves for a lively, organic touch.

objects.specification: A sleek standing podium with a neutral gray (RGB approx 128,128,128) finish, featuring a slanted top surface for holding notes or a device. The podium is constructed from a solid, matte material with subtle edges and a sturdy base, offering a professional presentation stand against the back wall.

A slender cylindrical pendant light fixture with a thin stem and warm yellow light (RGB approx 255,238,88). The fixture is crafted with a polished metal housing and a translucent diffuser at the bottom to softly illuminate the area below. Suspended from an implied ceiling, it offers a modern, minimalistic design.

A lightweight decorative balloon with a smooth glossy surface in vibrant red color, floating above the booth with a gentle tether effect, adding a festive accent to the environment.

A cushioned bench featuring a sturdy frame and soft red cushions (RGB approx 255,102,102), rendered in a contemporary style. The seat is upholstered with plush fabric, providing a comfortable spot for visitor relaxation, and the bench has clean lines with subtly rounded edges.
